name: Free Slots Wizards
description:
****** Free Wizard Slots Game! *******

***** Enchanting slot machine fun *****

Are you ready to have a magically good time?

Enter a world of wizards and be entranced in this wonderful slots game.

This game provides an amazing hands-on experience, bringing the magic and excitement to your iPhone, iPod touch and iPad by transforming your device into a feature-packed slot machine. In this world of magic wands, spell books, crystal balls and colorful potions, unravel the mysteries and treasures in each spin.

The app features multiple pay lines, engaging themes, fantastic jackpots, free bonuses and exciting new levels to challenge your skills. Featuring rich graphics, this game delivers a mystic and whimsical look and feel that is sure to keep you mesmerized.

Features:

* Huge Bonuses Daily
* Collect Hundreds of Coins
* Exciting animations and cool effects
* Unlock great new Slot Machines
* Simple interface

Cast a spell and win!

Download FREE Today!
